alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 13 at 2:04AM AKST until November 15 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT AKST TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Breaking waves of will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northwest Arctic Coast from Pt. Barrow southwest. * WHEN...From 9 AM Monday to midnight AKST Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Minor flooding in low-lying areas along the shoreline are possible, including portions of the road to Pt. Barrow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Elevated water levels 1 to 3 feet above the normal high tide line are expected. Peak water levels will occur Monday night and Tuesday. Sustained southwest winds 20 to 30 mph developing Monday will shift to the west on Tuesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
